content: I'll definitely try these stretches out! I've been feeling a bit tight in my shoulders and chest lately, so the chest stretch and shoulder rolls might be just what I need. Also, since I've started taking yoga on Wednesdays, I've been feeling more flexible overall, which is really helping with my weightlifting class on Saturdays. Speaking of yoga, do you have any recommendations for yoga poses that can help with flexibility and balance in weightlifting?
